ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.sleepinterval
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Time to sleep (in seconds) before starting a new poll requests if no outstanding artifacts are in the synch queue.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.autorestartperiod
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Time (in seconds) before CCF Core restarts automatically to avoid integration driver memory leak and clear global caches.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.identityMapEventWaitCount
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines how often an artifact is looked up in the identity mapping table before giving up.| Increase this value if you encounter problems with initial artifact resynch.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.identityMapEventWaitTime
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines how long(in milliseconds) to pause between identity mapping lookup requests| if corresponding artifact could not be found although artifact action was set to resynch.|Increase this value if you encounter problems with initial artifact resynch.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.ship.attachments
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines whether attachment should be shipped in that direction.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.package.release.separator
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Separator string used between file release package and file release title for building the package release human readable title, defaults to ' > '

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.tf.translate.technical.releaseids
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: If set to true, technical release ids (relxxx) are automatically translated into the human readable form.|Turning this setting on will have an performance impact because further SOAP calls have to be made.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.tf.ship.planningfolder.humanreadablename
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines whether to ship the human readable name of the assigned planning folder.|The name will contain the names of all parent planning folders, separated by the corresponding separator string.|Turning this setting on will have an performance impact because further SOAP calls have to be made.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.tf.ship.release.humanreadablename
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines whether to ship the human readable name of the release fields, including the package name, separated by the corresponding separator string.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.tf.planningfolder.separator
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Separator string used by building the planning folder human readable title, defaults to ' > '

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.qc.delaybefore.attachment.download
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines the waiting time in milliseconds before trying to download an attachment from Quality Center.|Increase this value if you encounter partially downloaded attachments.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.qc.releaseIdfields.containfilerelease.packagename
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines whether the human readable release name that should be| translated into a technical release id,prepended by the file release package title.|Only used if translateTechnicalReleaseIds property is set to true.

ccfcoreproperty.name: ccf.direction.identityMapEventWaitTime
ccfcoreproperty.toolTip: Determines how long(in milliseconds) to pause between identity mapping lookup requests | if corresponding artifact could not be found although artifact action was set to resynch.|Increase this value if you encounter problems with initial artifact resynch.
